name: Hunker Down
description:
HUNKER DOWN captures the fun of severe weather preparation and displays it in glorious gameboy-esque graphics.

As you wake up one beautiful winter morning your mother asks you to go pick up a few items and informs you that a blizzard is on the way. In fact, it'll hit in only 15 minutes, better hurry!

Meet all of the wacky townspeople, they might be a little off but they can be very helpful!

Collect all the items in time to make your folks proud!

Controls:

Move: WASD / ARROWS

Action: E

Access List: Q

Hunker Down 1.8 Update: We fixed issues with typos, snow falling, collision zones, color correction and additional dialog for a few characters. We also added some interactivity to the bookshelves, go check it out!

Thanks to the 19 people who downloaded the original version of the game, your support has led us to work hard to bring you this update.

Feel free to leave a comment, we'd love to hear from our fans. Additionally you can drop us a line at teggygame@gmail.com. Thanks and happy playing!
